function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Customers engaging in prosocial behavior","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, mask-wearing, and hand hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, mobile ordering apps, and digital menu boards","People":"Customers, food truck staff, local community","Owner":"Food truck operators"},{"Description":"Fostering connections with other businesses","Impact":"Increased contact and interaction between different businesses","Mitigation":"Limiting physical contact, promoting virtual communication, and implementing sanitation protocols","Technologies":"Video conferencing, online collaboration tools, and sanitation stations","People":"Food truck operators, local business owners, staff, and customers","Owner":"Local business community"}]}
